dialogue: We need to eat our own dog food.
You mean we need to use our company's products as if we were customers?
I'm not sure what I mean.
I once heard our CEO say the dog food thing, and I liked how wise it sounded.
It means we should use our own products.
That doesn't sound right. Why would we use our products when we can use good ones?
Because... it will make our products better over time.
To be honest it made more sense when I thought it meant dog food.
